item.title: My Custom Items :)
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:36, topic:224106”][quote author=Zach 93 link=topic=294393.msg2367494#msg2367494 date=1218035767]
Stop with the hardcoding. 503’s have arrived.
[/quote] Rofl this is easy as hell[/quote]

I agree ^^
Download galkons open source and this stuff if already on it, try adding some silabs.

I am atm, I have 90% of the main silabs, including all godswords, all armadyl, all bandos, around 15 new summoning npcs, fixed dragon full and neitiznot, all god robes, all barby assault stuff inc. Icons, proselyte, all defenders, and the keris dagger
Plus lots more i can’t remember.

And i did not just get a source with lots of items already added and just change names, i added them myself to Galkons very basic client, it had barely nothing on it

Get a model viewer and a Gzipper and start coding and adding your own items into your client instead of leeching other peoples.
My client’s coming out this week.

Read full topic

item.title: My Custom Items :)
item.dc:creator: @johnj98 johnj98
item.description:
@johnj98 wrote:

[quote=“rockh4rd, post:20, topic:224106”]theres already lava chain

if(i == 15338) { //lava chain class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[5]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [5]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 914; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 6070; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 918; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 6070; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 922; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 6071; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 391; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 6070; class8.anIntArray156[4] = 917; class8.anIntArray160[4] = 6069; class8.anInt181 = 1100; class8.anInt190 = 568; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 2; class8.anInt165 = 3820; class8.anInt200 = 3821; class8.anInt174 = 3823; class8.anInt188 = 156; class8.anInt164 = 337; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Lava Chainmail"; class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a Lava Chain".getBytes();

im working on lava plate cover to go into the amulet space ill let you guys no when done[/quote]
